channel.title: Two questions for a 562 server
channel.description:
Hello, I am new here and i want to make a 562 server. i have chosen zyntexscape source.
Now i want to change the writing which comes up in chat box thing.. It says welcome to zyntexscape - owner is fame.
What file do i have to change that in?
Second question.
How do i edit the shops? - simple question :)
